alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Finney; Hamilton; Hodgeman; Kearny; Lane; Ness; Rush; Scott; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 13 at 12:06PM CDT until April 13 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong South Winds and Wildfire Danger Thursday... ...Strong Dry Southwest Winds and Fire Danger Near Oklahoma Friday... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT /7 PM MDT/ THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 030, 031, 043, 044, 045, 046, AND 063... * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 030 Trego, Fire Weather Zone 031 Ellis, Fire Weather Zone 043 Scott, Fire Weather Zone 044 Lane, Fire Weather Zone 045 Ness, Fire Weather Zone 046 Rush, Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton, Fire Weather Zone 062 Kearny, Fire Weather Zone 063 Finney and Fire Weather Zone 064 Hodgeman. * WINDS...South 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Given the ongoing drought and continued dormant vegetation, any ignitions will have the potential to burn out of control quickly. Any outdoor burning, or outdoor activities involving sparks or flames, should be avoided.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Ellis; Finney; Hamilton; Hodgeman; Kearny; Lane; Ness; Rush; Scott; Trego
